name: Automatable
description: Can an attacker reliably automate creating exploitation events for this vulnerability?

values.name: No
values.description: Attackers cannot reliably automate steps 1-4 of the kill chain for this vulnerability. These steps are (1) reconnaissance, (2) weaponization, (3) delivery, and (4) exploitation.

values.name: Yes
values.description: Attackers can reliably automate steps 1-4 of the kill chain.
